title: Digital Technology-Enabled Student-Centered Learning Design for University Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level expertise in science and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Industry-linked program for current practitioners, emphasizing competency in designing experimental science education using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative activities for collecting scientific experiment data using digital tools
Learners can propose at least three digital instructional scenarios based on student-centered learning principles
Learners can perform at least two technology integration evaluations appropriate to science education contexts
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
